captions.text: Losing your village could be somewhat unpleasant;
we would like to make sure that this never happens to you.

To make sure your village
is truly well protected from lost progress,

all you need is your own device, one village,
and one Game Center account.
Game Center is an app on your Apple devices,
used to connect with your friends, and challenge other players.
Most importantly, Game Center saves your game data; making it your best option for preventing lost progress.
For example, the progress on these games that I am playing,
has all been saved right here, automatically.
Chief, one essential thing to note,

in Clash, your village can only be attached
to a single Game Center account.
If you are playing your game without an attached account, and someone else signs in to their Game Center

and loads your game, your base will permanently
be attached to their Game Center account.

Protect your village by creating or signing
in to your Game Center account!
To do this Enter your device's settings,
Scroll down to Game Center

And either sign in to your already existing
account if you have one,

Or, you can also create a new one if you have
not yet set up your Apple ID.

Since I already have an account, I will just
sign in to it.

Once you are signed in, make your way to Clash
of Clans, and launch your game. Clash, and
Game Center will be connected automatically.
When you open your village, you'll be notified with a "Welcome back text"
Be sure that this message contains your username.

If everything looks normal, why not get back
to upgrading those wizards?
Wizards are people too.

Have a shiny new device you'd like to play
on?
Or need to transfer your village to a working device?

To transfer the village, go to the App store
on your new device,
and download Clash of Clans.

After installation, be sure not to open the
game. That part's important!
Sign in to the Game Center account used on your old device, then open Clash of Clans from within Game Center.
To do this, tap on the "Games" icon.
From here, find Clash of Clans under "My iOS Games"

and in the top right corner of the screen,
you will notice three small dots. Tap on these,
then select "Play" to open Clash of Clans.
When the game opens, Game Center will prompt you with a pop-up that that gives you the

name and level of your village, if it is the
right one, tap on "Yes, load game" (Okay) and your
village is now playable on your new device.
So don't forget, for safe Clashing:
your own device, one village, and your Game Center account.
Clash on!

title: Clash of Clans: Save your Game Progress with Game Center (iOS)

comments.author: Miguel Flores

comments.text:
Speichere dein Dorf mit Game Center (iOS).

Wenn du dein Dorf nicht verlieren und dein Clashing-Erlebnis von vorne 
beginnen möchtest, wäre es vielleicht eine gute Idee, dein Dorf mit Game 
Center zu verbinden. Damit ist dein Fortschritt stets gesichert.
Game Center ist eine App auf Apple-Geräten, die den Fortschritt aller von 
dir gespielten Spiele speichert und es dir zudem ermöglicht, mit Freunden 
in Kontakt zu treten und dich mit ihnen zu messen.
Die Fortschritte deines Dorfs zu speichern geht ganz einfach. Alles, was du 
brauchst, sind dein eigenes Gerät, dein eigenes Dorf und ein Game 
Center-Account! In diesem coolen Tutorial-Video erfährst du genau, wie das 
geht:﻿
